005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model;
007
008import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
009
010public abstract class AbstractInstance<P extends IContainer> implements IInstance {
011  @NonNull
012  private final P parent;
013
014  /**
015   * Construct a new instance.
016   *
017   * @param parent
018   *          the parent containing the instance.
019   */
020  protected AbstractInstance(@NonNull P parent) {
021    this.parent = parent;
022  }
023
024  @Override
025  @NonNull
026  public final P getParentContainer() {
027    return parent;
028  }
029}
